General.Name: Global Li-Ion Graphite Corp
General.Description: Global Li-Ion Graphite Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral resources in Canada. It holds an option to acquire 100% interest in the Madagascar Graphite property comprising 3 mining exploitation permits covering an area of approximately 4,375 hectares located in Madagascar; and the Neuron Graphite project situated in Northern Manitoba, Canada. The company was formerly known as Thelon Diamonds Ltd. and changed its name to Global Li-Ion Graphite Corp. in July 2017. Global Li-Ion Graphite Corp. was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3A8
